name: British Airways Business Class, Club Europe, A320 - Prague to London Heathrow
description:
This video features British Airways' business class on short haul routes, marketed as Club Europe. The video focuses on the ground and air service, the lounges, boarding, take off and landing. There are some food and drink highlights too!

Have you ever flown Club Europe?

Leave me a comment to let me know what you think of the video!

(note - this is a reupload thanks to a subtitle error!)
